attributes.action: Allow a referendum on the any new laws brought in to tackle the problems currently surrounding MPs expenses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As so many of our representatives have shown themselves to be completely untrustworthy in this matter, we the undersigned would like a referendum to take place on the laws these same representatives come up with to tackle the issue - in the true spirit of 'government of the people, by the people, for the people'. In these stringent economic times it is in the interest of the nation to ensure that thousands of pounds worth of taxpayers money is not wasted.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
